tasks.title: Backend - FaceAnalysis Model & CRUD
tasks.description:
Create the FaceAnalysis model and CRUD endpoints for storing face analysis results.

Model fields:
- ID (uuid, primary key)
- UserID (uuid, foreign key to users)
- ImageURL (string) - stored selfie path
- OverallScore (float) - 1-10 attractiveness rating
- SymmetryScore (float) - facial symmetry 1-10
- JawlineScore (float) - jawline definition 1-10
- SkinScore (float) - skin health 1-10
- EyeScore (float) - eye area rating 1-10
- NoseScore (float) - nose proportion 1-10
- LipsScore (float) - lips rating 1-10
- HarmonyScore (float) - facial harmony 1-10
- Strengths ([]string) - top 3 best features as JSON
- Improvements ([]string) - suggested improvements as JSON
- AnalyzedAt (timestamp)
- CreatedAt, UpdatedAt, DeletedAt (soft delete)

Create:
- backend/internal/models/face_analysis.go
- backend/internal/services/face_analysis_service.go
- backend/internal/handlers/face_analysis.go
- backend/internal/dto/face_analysis.go

Endpoints:
- POST /api/analyses - create new analysis (accepts image_url, scores can be mock for now)
- GET /api/analyses - list user's analyses (paginated)
- GET /api/analyses/:id - get single analysis
- DELETE /api/analyses/:id - soft delete
- GET /api/analyses/latest - get user's most recent analysis
- GET /api/analyses/stats - average scores over time

Register routes in backend/internal/routes/routes.go
Add AutoMigrate in backend/internal/database/database.go

tasks.title: Backend - MewingProgress Model & Tracking
tasks.description:
Create the MewingProgress model for daily mewing habit tracking.

Model fields:
- ID (uuid, primary key)
- UserID (uuid, foreign key)
- Date (date) - tracking date
- MewingMinutes (int) - minutes spent mewing today
- Completed (bool) - daily goal met
- Notes (string) - optional user notes
- JawlinePhotoURL (string) - optional daily progress photo
- CreatedAt, UpdatedAt, DeletedAt

Also create MewingGoal model:
- ID (uuid)
- UserID (uuid)
- DailyMinutesGoal (int) - target minutes per day (default 60)
- ReminderEnabled (bool)
- ReminderTime (string) - HH:MM format
- CurrentStreak (int) - consecutive days completed
- LongestStreak (int)
- CreatedAt, UpdatedAt

Create:
- backend/internal/models/mewing_progress.go (both models)
- backend/internal/services/mewing_service.go
- backend/internal/handlers/mewing.go
- backend/internal/dto/mewing.go

Endpoints:
- POST /api/mewing/log - log today's mewing session
- GET /api/mewing/today - get today's progress
- GET /api/mewing/history - get history (last 30 days)
- GET /api/mewing/streaks - get streak info
- PUT /api/mewing/goal - update daily goal settings
- GET /api/mewing/goal - get current goal settings

Register routes and add AutoMigrate.

tasks.title: Backend - GlowPlan Recommendations
tasks.description:
Create the GlowPlan model for personalized improvement recommendations.

Model fields:
- ID (uuid, primary key)
- UserID (uuid, foreign key)
- AnalysisID (uuid, foreign key to face_analyses) - based on which analysis
- Category (string) - 'jawline', 'skin', 'style', 'fitness', 'grooming'
- Title (string) - recommendation title
- Description (text) - detailed recommendation
- Priority (int) - 1-5, higher = more impactful
- Difficulty (string) - 'easy', 'medium', 'hard'
- TimeframeWeeks (int) - expected time to see results
- IsCompleted (bool)
- CompletedAt (timestamp)
- CreatedAt, UpdatedAt, DeletedAt

Create:
- backend/internal/models/glow_plan.go
- backend/internal/services/glow_plan_service.go
- backend/internal/handlers/glow_plan.go
- backend/internal/dto/glow_plan.go

Endpoints:
- GET /api/glow-plan - get user's current recommendations
- POST /api/glow-plan/generate - generate new plan based on latest analysis (mock AI for now)
- PUT /api/glow-plan/:id/complete - mark recommendation as completed
- GET /api/glow-plan/progress - completed vs total count

The generate endpoint should create 5-8 mock recommendations based on the lowest scoring areas from the analysis.

Register routes and add AutoMigrate.
